projects.title: Cloud-Based Vehicle Tracking System
objectives: Check in-time by reading RFID card and retrieve car details like owner's name and car number.
Maintain records of all registered vehicles' in-time and out-time.
Provide unified information across multiple gates via a single website.
Enable vehicle tracking through owner's name.
Ensure information accessibility via the website.

projects.title: Basic Banking System
projects.description: Developed a website to demonstrate money transfers between accounts.

tasks.problem_statement: Predict the percentage of a student based on study hours.
tasks.additional_question: What will be the predicted score if a student studies for 9.25 hrs/day?

tasks.problem_statement: Predict the optimum number of clusters from the Iris dataset and represent it visually.
Analyze 'SampleSuperstore' data to identify weak business areas and derive actionable insights.

projects.title: Analyze Crop Production of India
problem_statements: Find the average production of crops in India.
Identify the crop with the maximum yield (Tonnes/Hectare).
Compare Rice production between Odisha and West Bengal.
Determine the state with the highest Wheat production.
Predict Rice production for Andhra Pradesh, Uttar Pradesh, and Tamil Nadu in 2014.

projects.title: Foodazon - Canteen Management System
projects.description: Developed Foodazon, an easy canteen management system using Laravel and MySQL.
